LanguageData.OG_Imperial_Sororitas_Sister.title: Battle Sister
LanguageData.OG_Imperial_Sororitas_Sister.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a young, undistinguished Sister but only a fool would look down on [PAWN_possessive] for that. [PAWN_possessive] faith in and zeal for the Emperor will lead [PAWN_possessive] to great deeds or a glorious death.
